title: St. Helens
writer: Michael T. Murphy (story), Larry Sturholm (story), Peter Bellwood (screenplay), Larry Ferguson (screenplay)
actors: Art Carney, David Huffman, Cassie Yates, Albert Salmi
plot: Dramatization of the 1980 eruption of Mt. St. Helens. The movie begins with the volcano's awakening on March 20 and ends with its eruption on May 18, 1980.
name: St. Helens
